channel.title: Rune-Evolution 742 - with Teamspeak!
channel.description:
[size=2em]Rune-Evolution 742[/size] Hosted by King Fox 24/7
[b]Webclient[/b]: [url=http://rune-evo.net/misc.php?page=playnow]Click Here![/url] [b]Download Client[/b]: [url=http://rune-evo.net/download/DesktopClient.zip]Click Here![/url] [b]Forums[/b]: [url=http://rune-evo.net]Click Here![/url]
[b]Teamspeak IP[/b]: ts3-rune.no-ip.biz
Rune-Evo was started a few months ago as a 667 server and eventually grew into a 742. We have almost everything fully working, and much more to come in later updates! We're hosting this from a VPS meaning no downtime and no lag. Please donate and you will receive an exclusive donator cape and a few other goodies! We have a unique well designed and organized website for various things, along with friendly staff to help you! Join us today to get started on an adventure you'll never forget :D
[ul][li]Fully working Fight Caves (All 63 waves)[/li] [li]Fully working Fight Kiln[/li] [li]Full Nex and Nomad with cut-scenes[/li] [li]Unique custom made home[/li] [li]Fully automated DoubleXP Weekends[/li] [li]Great Economy[/li] [li]Full Squeal of Fortune![/li] [li]Rewritten price loading using Enum[/li] [li]All pets working[/li] [li]Full summoning (except scrolls)[/li] [li]Most skills fully working[/li] [li]Crucible also fully working![/li] [li]All GodWars bosses![/li] [li]Full QBD and KBD[/li] [li]No lag or memory leaks. No dupes.[/li] [li]All Aura's Working with Wings and stuff[/li][/ul] [img]http://i.imgur.com/6ouykJE.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/2bUBNjW.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/7oOXFBQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/vD4JNqe.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/ePaDMl1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/GmzpErH.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/uIgHktx.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/aT8XNfS.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/Em32HQY.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/JIzRUAo.png[/img]

item.title: Rune-Evolution 742 - with Teamspeak!
item.dc:creator: @XxRawrxXD XxRawrxXD
item.description:
@XxRawrxXD wrote:

it is legitimate, I tried it, no viruses, works fine, although I wish more people used their teamspeak

Read full topic

item.title: Rune-Evolution 742 - with Teamspeak!
item.dc:creator: @Potzon Potzon
item.description:
@Potzon wrote:

Sorry, but I won’t join this…
All the in-game content that you’re showing us has already been released in (almost) all 718+ servers.
Only your home is “unique”.

Read full topic
